results.title: A Case of Angiotensin-Converting Enzyme (ACE) Inhibitor-Induced Small Bowel Angioedema
results.text_hl: Due to the recurrent nature of these episodes over the last three years, along with consistent findings of small @<m>DISEASE_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@bowel edema@@@ on imaging, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@-induced @DISEASE_Angioedema @DISEASE_MESH:D000799 @@@angioedema@@@ was suspected.

citations.NLM: Pirzada S, Raza B, Mankani AA, Naveed B. A Case of Angiotensin-Converting Enzyme (ACE) Inhibitor-Induced Small Bowel Angioedema Cureus. 2023 Oct;15(10):e47739. PMID: 38022184
citations.BibTeX: @article{38022184, title={A Case of Angiotensin-Converting Enzyme (ACE) Inhibitor-Induced Small Bowel Angioedema}, author={Pirzada S and Raza B and Mankani AA and Naveed B}, journal={Cureus}, volume={15}, number={10}, pages={e47739}}

results.title: Targeting inflammation and redox perturbations by lisinopril mitigates Freund's adjuvant-induced arthritis in rats: role of JAK-2/STAT-3/RANKL axis, MMPs, and VEGF.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ attenuated the progression of @DISEASE_Arthritis @DISEASE_MESH:D001168 @@@arthritis@@@ as proven by lowering paw @<m>DISEASE_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@edema@@@, @DISEASE_Arthritis_Psoriatic @DISEASE_MESH:D015535 @@@arthritic@@@ index, and gait scores alongside diminishing the immune-cell infiltration/aberrant histopathology in the dorsal pouch lining.

citations.NLM: Arab HH, Abd El-Aal SA, Ashour AM, El-Sheikh AAK, Al Khabbaz HJ, Arafa EA, Mahmoud AM, Kabel AM. Targeting inflammation and redox perturbations by lisinopril mitigates Freund's adjuvant-induced arthritis in rats: role of JAK-2/STAT-3/RANKL axis, MMPs, and VEGF. Inflammopharmacology. 2022 Oct;30(5):1909-1926. PMID: 35764864
citations.BibTeX: @article{35764864, title={Targeting inflammation and redox perturbations by lisinopril mitigates Freund's adjuvant-induced arthritis in rats: role of JAK-2/STAT-3/RANKL axis, MMPs, and VEGF.}, author={Arab HH and Abd El-Aal SA and Ashour AM and El-Sheikh AAK and Al Khabbaz HJ and Arafa EA and Mahmoud AM and Kabel AM}, journal={Inflammopharmacology}, volume={30}, number={5}, pages={1909-1926}}

results.title: A Gut Feeling: Isolated Small Bowel Angioedema due to Angiotensin-Converting Enzyme Inhibitor.
results.text_hl: Here, we present a case of @DISEASE_Angioedema @DISEASE_MESH:D000799 @@@visceral angioedema@@@ in a 32-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ who presented with @DISEASE_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@left upper quadrant pain@@@, @DISEASE_Nausea @DISEASE_MESH:D009325 @@@nausea@@@, @DISEASE_Vomiting @DISEASE_MESH:D014839 @@@vomiting@@@, @DISEASE_Diarrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhea@@@, and characteristic radiographic signs of small @<m>DISEASE_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@bowel angio-edema@@@, six months after starting @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@.

citations.NLM: Pinto MB, Vecchio M, Santos MA. A Gut Feeling: Isolated Small Bowel Angioedema due to Angiotensin-Converting Enzyme Inhibitor. R I Med J (2013). 2022 Aug 1;105(6):28-31. PMID: 35881996
citations.BibTeX: @article{35881996, title={A Gut Feeling: Isolated Small Bowel Angioedema due to Angiotensin-Converting Enzyme Inhibitor.}, author={Pinto MB and Vecchio M and Santos MA}, journal={R I Med J (2013)}, volume={105}, number={6}, pages={28-31}}

results.title: Adult-Onset Immunoglobulin A Vasculitis With Renal Involvement
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was treated with oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ 2.5 mg daily for @DISEASE_Proteinuria @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ and oral @CHEMICAL_Furosemide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005665 @@@furosemide@@@ 40 mg daily to help alleviate @<m>DISEASE_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@lower extremities edema@@@.

citations.NLM: Khor SY, Osman AF, Haddad I, AlAttal S, Khan N. Adult-Onset Immunoglobulin A Vasculitis With Renal Involvement Cureus. 2022 Mar;14(3):e23649. PMID: 35505746

results.title: A systematic review on COVID-19 vaccination and cosmetic filler reactions: A focus on case studies and original articles.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@, hyaluronidase, and corticosteroids seemed to have good results in management.

citations.NLM: Kalantari Y, Aryanian Z, Mirahmadi SM, Alilou S, Hatami P, Goodarzi A. A systematic review on COVID-19 vaccination and cosmetic filler reactions: A focus on case studies and original articles. J Cosmet Dermatol. 2022 Jul;21(7):. PMID: 35534886

results.title: Angioedema complicating lisinopril therapy.
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ presented with acute onset of @<m>DISEASE_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@swelling@@@ involving the oro-facial region and @DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@respiratory distress@@@ after ingestion of three doses of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ over a three day period.

citations.NLM: Nzerue MC. Angioedema complicating lisinopril therapy. Cent Afr J Med. 1992 Sep;38(9):391-2. PMID: 1338526

results.title: Nisoldipine CC and lisinopril alone or in combination for treatment of mild to moderate systemic hypertension. Canadian Nisoldipine CC Hypertension Trial Group.
results.text_hl: Adverse effects were more frequent with nisoldipine CC (@DISEASE_Headache @DISEASE_MESH:D006261 @@@headache@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@peripheral edema@@@) than with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (@DISEASE_Cough @DISEASE_MESH:D003371 @@@cough@@@) monotherapy.

citations.NLM: Ruddy TD, Fodor JG. Nisoldipine CC and lisinopril alone or in combination for treatment of mild to moderate systemic hypertension. Canadian Nisoldipine CC Hypertension Trial Group. Cardiovasc Drugs Ther. 1997 Sep;11(4):581-90. PMID: 9358963
citations.BibTeX: @article{9358963, title={Nisoldipine CC and lisinopril alone or in combination for treatment of mild to moderate systemic hypertension. Canadian Nisoldipine CC Hypertension Trial Group.}, author={Ruddy TD and Fodor JG}, journal={Cardiovasc Drugs Ther}, volume={11}, number={4}, pages={581-90}}

results.title: Late onset angiotensin-converting enzyme induced angioedema: case report and review of the literature.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@Visceral edema@@@ induced by ACEI has also occurred.
